specs.title: should display real customer data feature
should display courier options with LMT scores
should display how it works steps
should NOT display margin or revenue information
should have Start Shipping Now button
should have grayscale logos that turn color on hover
should have email input and subscribe button
should have alt text on images
should have no broken internal links
